version_description:
This update fixes a problem with disappearing premium brushes. If you have lost any of them, please tap on restore icon (available in options menu). We do apologize for inconvenience!

If you are experiencing any issues with "Let's Create! Pottery" please contact us at support@idreams.pl

We'd like to thank you for purchasing our game. If you like it, please rate it every time an update comes out.

Improved compatibility with the latest generation of devices.
Improved compatibility with the latest generation of devices.

Minor bugfixes and improvements.

If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it - this will keep us motivated. Thank you!

Minor bugfixes and improvements.

If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it - this will keep us motivated. Thank you!

- Introducing Augumented Reality. See how your pot looks in your room!
- New patterns.
- Minor bugfixes and improvements.

Augumented Reality (AR) works on devices that support ARKit.

If you have any problems with "Let's Create! Pottery", please do contact us at support@idreams.pl.
We make games with love. If you like what we do, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks! :)
